name: Breadpocalypse: Revenge of the Crows
description:
In a world were crows have teamed up with the deadly loaf army, they rule over all bird kind. Until one lucky duck gets gifted a mysterious power and it is up to them to thward the crow's reign of tryanny. Always remember, it's okay to fail, but never disappoint.

This game was made for the AGDS Freshers Game Jam where the theme is 'it's okay to fail'. In the game you'll need to toy with death as 'failing' (dying) will send you to the worlds between and reveal paths not accessable from before. But dying after failing, now that's rather dissapointing which is never okay and you won't be protected anymore. Also jumping on an enemy's head kills them (damages the boss).

Controls:

move (left and right) - a,d keys/arrows

jump - spacebar

Powerups:

Death platform - Create platform on death

Double jump - Can double jump

Kill switch - Pressing e sends the player to the other realm

Credits:

Patrick (https://park66.itch.io/) - Player, UI and sound mechanics

Alex (https://alex-onions.itch.io/) - AI and enemy sounds

Bee/Bibi (insta-@bees_files) - Player, enemy, title screen, checkpoint and powerup art and animations.

Finn (https://throckmorpheus.itch.io/) - Boss, world tiles art and animations and level design.

Other credits:
